name: Dragon's Rampage
description:
The game is based on being ridiculously overpowered. You're a dragon who flies around and destroys different towns in an endless, procedurally generated world.

A game made by a couple of friends during 48 hours using one of Ludum Dare's themes "Ridiculously Overpowered".

Authors:

Fredrik "Skratzy" Junede

Henrik "H3nx" Johansson

Alexander "Pirat" Wester

Lisette "Fluffisette" Haglund

Elin "Shireelin" Hägg

And most importantly, Oliver "Boliver" Doggoson
